bibl.title: The Small Church at Ismant el-Kharab, Ancient Kellis.
bibl.note: 2000 field season. The structure is an example of a domus ecclesiae, that is, the conversion of a pre-existing building for use as a church. Coins and ceramics confirm a Fourth Century date.
bibl.seg: BOWEN Gillian E., The Small Church at Ismant el-Kharab, Ancient Kellis.
2000 field season. The structure is an example of a domus ecclesiae, that is, the conversion of a pre-existing building for use as a church. Coins and ceramics confirm a Fourth Century date.
